scripts.build:justlog: asc --optimize --runtime stub --exportRuntime --stats src/carts/justlog.ts -o build/justlog.wasm -t build/justlog.wat --bindings esm && cd build && cp justlog.wasm main.wasm && zip -r justlog.null0 main.wasm && rm main.wasm
scripts.build:http: asc --optimize --runtime stub --exportRuntime --stats src/carts/http.ts -o build/http.wasm -t build/http.wat --bindings esm && cd build && cp http.wasm main.wasm && zip -r http.null0 main.wasm && rm main.wasm
